commandDescription: Queries Permission info and provides a list of Permissions that are Duplicates of eachother
profilesonlyFlagDescription: Optional: If provided only profiles will be compared
permissionsetsonlyFlagDescription: Optional: If provided only permission sets will be compared
permissionidFlagDescription: Optional: Provide a Permission Set or Profile Id to limit the results to permissions that match the Permission with the provided Id
savedirFlagDescription: Optional: Provide if you would like to save the file to a directory other than the projects 'buildDirectory'
errorOnlyFilters: You provided both profileonly and permissionsetsonly. Please only select one and try again.
